title: Obama: Claims Of Neglect At VA Hospital Being Taken 'Very Seriously'
teaser: There are allegations that 40 veterans died while waiting for medical appointments at the VA health care center in Phoenix.
contentencoded:
President Obama said today that his administration will look into allegations that 40 veterans in Arizona died while waiting for medical appointments at the VA health care center in Phoenix, Arizona.

Carrie Jung has been covering this story for KJZZ in Phoenix and joins Here & Now’s Robin Young with details.

Guest

  • Carrie Jung, reporter for Here & Now contributor station KJZZ in Phoenix. She tweets @Jung_Carrie.
